params._name: descriptive name for the match (e.g. Pac vs. Mayweather 2016)
params._participants: |-delimited string of participants names (e.g. "Manny Pac|Floyd May")

params._matchId: unique id of the match to modify

getAllMatches().return: an array of unique match ids

params._pending: if true, will return only the most recent pending match; otherwise, returns the most recent match either pending or completed
